step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting in a comfortable position. Ensure your arms are fully stretched overhead and fingers are open.
You're making a good fist and pushing down. Try to squeeze your shoulder blades together more firmly as you tighten your muscles.
Excellent! You're stretching your arms back overhead and exhaling. Keep up the smooth, controlled movements.
Great job on the repetitions. Focus on maintaining a steady breath throughout the movement.
You're doing well with the overall motion. Ensure you are fully relaxing and exhaling as you return to the starting position.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to stretch your arms overhead with open fingers, then make a fist while pushing down and squeezing your shoulder blades. Exhale as you relax and stretch back up.
